Thank you again!! Arnold

>>> jdz@... 03/21/05 1:08 PM >>>

 

Socha, Henryk.  Elementy broni samurajskiej - Tsuba [Elements of the
Arms of the Samurai - The Tsuba], Warsaw:  Dom Wydawnictwo Bellona,
2003.



It can be purchased via:



http://www.merlin.com.pl/





Merlin is essentially a Polish-language Amazon.  Go to: Books (Ksiazki),
then Search (Szukaj), on "tsuba".    The only tricky part is typing a
US/Canadian address into the Polish spaces provided.   





Hey! look at that, they've eben got abn English-language how to page:



http://www.merlin.com.pl/frontend/static/info/first_purchase/how_to_buy_eng.jsp

  From: arnold frenzel

  Subject: [nihontostudy] Polish book


  Hi:
  Some months ago there was passing reference to a new publication on
  tsuba (and other fittings?) to be published in Poland. Has anyone more
  recent information and a source? Thanks. Arnold
